data.text: @Jg40851122 @willyloman1 There is an immediate link. It's always on his Twitter page if you look. As I explained, he posts a "teaser" thumbnail on Twitter before the actual video is up. Just the way he does things. The easiest way to keep track of Scott's work is to go directly to his BitChute channel.
@AuntBee8 @willyloman1 Thank you!  (was just thinking more People might read or listen if there was an immediate link)

@Jg40851122 @willyloman1 This is the post on his Twitter page from just this morning. You can see the same thumbnail, but it contains the actual link to the BitChute video. He always posts the video on his page after the "teaser" thumbnail.

https://t.co/s4xBwmcE7E

@Jg40851122 @willyloman1 Scott always posts a "teaser" thumbnail before he posts the video on BitChute. That's just the way he operates. If you check his Twitter page, you will see the video link. You can always go directly to his BitChute channel where his videos always appear, often before Twitter.

@PrepIsPoison @willyloman1 colds never reduce olfactory on a neurological level! They do so via congestion. I’ve had plenty of colds and flus and KNOW what I had was qualitatively different. As do many non old ppl who have contracted it. Big Pharma & DARPA spent yrs and billions on imaginary GOF ?! 🙄

@atarilo1 @willyloman1 I get the common cold every couple of years and always lose my taste, Not a new thing. It's all in your head (see the psyop), and it makes no sense epidemiologically. A novel thing that only hits old people is not an infectious disease.

@PrepIsPoison @willyloman1 Sorry bioweapons exist and are used. Not a Nocebo effect. I’ve had it twice. First time lost taste/smell in a neurological way (not sinus congestion related ). Novel virus. Been sequenced and isolated. Info war is exaggerating, obfuscating and leveraging AN ACTUAL MAN MADE VIRUS.
